COMMENTARY:
If the government will keep restoring the "white sand" beach each time a typhoon or high tide pulls away the dolomites, when can it stop spending precious money for such an unnecessary cosmetic project?

Starting Nov. 3, Antonio Montalvan II will be writing commentaries for VERA Files. 

His writings revolve around democratic citizenship, human rights, arts & culture, and whatever makes him strike while the iron is hot, all with the aim of conscience building for the common good. https://t.co/Mu8f3XYRGA
